::Surgital::

    Surgital strafed out of the way of the missiles.

g around.

      Surgital aimed his elbow at the hole, then shot an energon=
 net to try and cover the top of the hole, to sort of keep Greven in there.=

tal was just about to bring his foot down hard on Cledar,
